name: Live Love Laugh Wine Glass - Hand Painted & Dishwasher Safe
description:
What a beautiful set for your head table or for wedding guest favours. This 12 oz Universal Wine glass, used by caterers to serve both red and white wine is carefully hand painted with our popular Live Love Laugh design and then heat set to make it completely dishwasher safe in the top rack.

This glass is base painted with white and shimmering gold paint, then white and gold roses are painted around the bowl, accented with dark green and gold leaves. Finally, the words "Live, Love, Laugh" are hand written around the glass in black script. It measures approximately 7 3/4" tall and 3" wide at the widest point of the bowl.

These glasses are painted and signed by artist Lynette Sadowy. Lynette has been featured on HGTV for her beautiful glassware.

A set of these will make a perfect gift for a bridal shower or wedding gift.

Price is for one glass. All glasses can be gift wrapped at no additional charge. We always combine shipping to save you money. Please read our feedback to see how happy our customers are!
